ComicInfo.Summary: "THE LOST KINGS" Julien discovers a geometrical riddle hidden in plain sight on the streets of Paris. The key to the puzzle leads him into the deepest danger he has ever known. Meanwhile, a minor aristocrat frustrates the Duke of Lorraine's sinister plans. Lorraine will have to find a way around? or through? the problem.
ComicInfo.Title: The Lost Kings
